name: "Keep It!" (Just In Case) [Web Build]
description:
https://aeter9000.itch.io/just-in-case GMTK ver 

https://aeter9000.itch.io/just-in-case-unsubmitted-ver Downloadable Build

 THIS CURRENT VERSION WAS NOT SUBMITTED TO GMTK GAME JAM 2021, THIS IS JUST FOR MY SAKE. 

[GMTK Ver Description] 

 You are a knight trying to escape a tower, picking up weapons and potions to aid you in your quest.

But where will you put it? 

 On your body of course. Stick them together.  

The more items you take, the harder it is to traverse the tower, causing you to leave important items, and backtrack when you need them again.  There are 6 screens you must traverse, with ghosts and spikes sure to stop you in your tracks.

  • WASD/ARROW KEYS TO MOVE 
  • C TO JUMP 
  • E (or click the button on the top left) TO ACCESS INVENTORY 
  •  PAUSE BUTTON IS ON THE TOP MIDDLE 
  •  ESC TO TOGGLE FULL SCREEN
  • PAUSE BUTTON IS ON THE TOP MIDDLE

Because my way of implementing camera transitions was bad, there is an emergency button below your hearts, that makes the camera shift to your player. Use this if the camera does not work.

https://www.beepbox.co/player/#song=8n31sbk0l00e07t3bm0a7g0fj07i0r1o3210T1v1L4u2... Theme Song Link :)

v1.02 - Canvas Scaling, Fullscreen Toggle, Reset Button
